summary:
Google Search is the world's most popular search engine, helping people find information on the internet. Users type in keywords or phrases, and Google's algorithms find relevant websites. It's used by billions of people every day, with many countries relying on it the most.

Google Search started in 1996 and has grown to offer many helpful features, like voice search, knowledge graphs, and specialized searches. It even helps spot trends and predict things like flu outbreaks. However, in 2024, Google was ruled to have an illegal monopoly over internet searches.
title: Google Search
